response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. This product is not just an item; it's a gateway to achieving significant benefits and outcomes tailored to your needs. Given its exceptional worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial advantage while ensuring you secure a remarkable deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 9500}
